ygData.msgSnippet: Squizzy:: I don t need repair. I need out of here. Please, I m scared and I don t know who you are, who those other bots are, where I am or what is even

Squizzy::

"I don't need repair. I need out of here. Please, I'm scared and I 
don't know who you are, who those other bots are, where I am or what 
is even happening. And since I got here, I've been shot at. HIt with 
an arrow whic is still in my shoulder, taked captive by one bot then 
by a really big bot. Then stuffed into here and now I'm talking to 
you. And your telling me to be calm?" her voice raising to a higher 
pitch with each word. She winced as the arrow sent pain through ehr 
shoulder.  She looked out the window,"BY the way, where are you 
taking me?



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Giant bots arn't allowed, but gestalts are (with special 
permission). 
> Oblitertron is 5 bots combined, he isn't one single huge bot.
> 
> Oblitertron did grab Squishy already, but I'll accept that his hand 
is 
> charred.
> 
> Also, you forgot to post for Thrash's, DevilDuer's, and Hurricane's 
shots on 
> Depth Charge.
> 
> ::Oblitertron/DevilDuer::
> 
> Oblitertron growls, taking a few steps back to keep his balance 
from the 
> twister under him. Inside his mind, Dark One was giving orders.
> 
> "In a few seconds we seperate," his voice sounds to the other 
Oblitercons, 
> "I'm going to get this femm back to base. You four take out these 
Maximals."
> 
> Firing a final optic shot at Arcangel, Oblitertron lifts Squizzy to 
his 
> chest, a panel sliding aside as he drops her into a compartment. 
The gestalt 
> begins to separate, four bots resulting from the huge bot in a few 
seconds.
> 
> Dark One, with Squizzy inside his cockpit, launches off, heading 
for the 
> Alliance base. His cockpit was simply a space with walls inside it, 
no 
> computers or outlets. Seeing that Squizzy was awake, Dark One 
activates an 
> innercom.
> 
> "Calm yourself," he says into the cockpit, "You'll be repaired 
soon."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Pyro laughs, transforming into vehicle mode and firing a blast of 
fire at 
> DepthCharge. Breakdown transforms into a HUMVEE, his machine gun 
firing off 
> at Arcangel.
> 
> Hiss and Scavanger run toward the Maximals, firing at them.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer gruts as two ion disks hit him in the side, sending him 
tripping 
> sideways over a rock. He jumps up, wincing at the pain as he 
returns fire at 
> Depth Charge.
